languages.text: Крестовый поход Инцендии Чорда положил конец существованию этого оскверненного места. Ценой великих потерь ведомый ею флот ворвался в систему, нанес поражение порождениям варпа и бомбардировал каждый из миров циклонными торпедами, пока те не обратились во прах. Спустя десятилетие варп-язва в реальности закрылась.

Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in realspace closed.
languages.original_text: Крестовый поход Инцендии Чорда положил конец существованию этого оскверненного места. Ценой великих потерь ведомый ею флот ворвался в систему, нанес поражение порождениям варпа и бомбардировал каждый из миров циклонными торпедами, пока те не обратились во прах. Спустя десятилетие варп-язва в реальности закрылась.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp-spawn and bombed every world with cyclonic torpedoes, until they turned into ash. A decade later, the warp-ulcer in reality closed.

Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp-spawn and bombed every world with cyclonic torpedoes, until they turned into ash. A decade later, the warp-ulcer in reality closed.

Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp-spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in reality closed.

Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp-spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in reality closed.

Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in realspace closed.

Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in realspace closed.

languages.text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达进行了远征，终结了这片腐化之地。她的舰队付出了惨重的代价，闯入了这个星系，消灭了星系中的亚空间怪物，还用旋风鱼雷将所有行星都化为了灰烬。十年之后，这条横亘在真实世界中的亚空间裂隙终于闭合了。
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in realspace closed.

traits.locale_text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达进行了远征，终结了这片腐化之地。她的舰队付出了惨痛的代价，闯入了这个星系，消灭了星系中的亚空间怪物，还用旋风鱼雷将所有行星都化为了灰烬。十年之后，这条横亘在真实世界中的亚空间裂隙终于闭合了。

languages.text: Incendia Chordas Kreuzzug setzte der Existenz dieses verderbten Sündenpfuhls ein Ende. Mit schweren Verlusten brach ihre Flotte in das System durch, besiegte die Warpbrut dort und verwandelte sämtliche Welten durch ein Bombardement mit Zyklonentorpedos in Schutt und Asche. Ein Jahrzehnt später schloss sich der Warpriss im Realraum.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in realspace closed.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chordas Kreuzzug setzte der Existenz dieses verderbten Sündenpfuhls ein Ende. Mit schweren Verlusten brach ihre Flotte in das System durch, besiegte die Warpbrut dort und verwandelte sämtliche Welten durch ein Bombardement mit Zyklonentorpedos in Schutt und Asche. Ein Jahrzehnt später schloss sich der Warpriss in der Realität.

languages.text: La croisade d'Incendia Chorda mit fin à l'existence de ce lieu corrompu. Au prix de lourdes pertes, sa flotte parvint à s'introduire dans le système, vainquit les abominations du Warp et bombarda tous les mondes à grand renfort de torpilles cycloniques. Dix ans plus tard, la fracture du Warp qui déchirait la réalité disparut enfin.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in realspace closed.

traits.locale_text: La croisade d'Incendia Chorda mit fin à l'existence de ce lieu corrompu. Au prix de lourdes pertes, sa flotte parvint à s'introduire dans le système, vainquit les abominations du Warp et bombarda tous les mondes à grand renfort de torpilles cycloniques. Dix ans plus tard, la fracture du Warp qui déchirait la réalité disparut enfin.

languages.text: La cruzada de Incendia Chorda puso fin a la existencia de este nido de corrupción. No sin graves pérdidas, su flota entró al sistema, derrotó a los engendros de la disformidad y bombardeó todos sus mundos hasta convertirlos en ceniza con torpedos ciclónicos. Una década más tarde, el desgarro de la disformidad en el espacio real se cerró.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in realspace closed.

traits.locale_text: La cruzada de Incendia Chorda puso fin a la existencia de este nido de corrupción. No sin graves pérdidas, su flota entró al sistema, derrotó a los engendros de la disformidad y bombardeó todos sus mundos hasta convertirlos en ceniza con torpedos ciclónicos. Una década más tarde, el desgarro de la disformidad se cerró.

languages.text: インセンディア・チョーダの聖戦は、この堕落した場所の存在に終止符を打った。彼女の艦隊は大損害を出しながらも星系に侵入し、ワープスポーンを打ち破り、サイクロン・トルピードですべての世界を灰燼に帰した。10年後、リアルスペースの<歪み>の裂け目は閉じた。
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in realspace closed.

traits.locale_text: インセンディア・チョーダの聖戦は、この堕落した場所の存在に終止符を打った。彼女の艦隊は大損害を出しながらも星系に侵入し、ワープスポーンを打ち破り、サイクロン・トルピードですべての世界を灰燼に帰した。10年後、現実の<歪み>の裂け目は閉じた。

languages.text: İncendia Chorda'nın askerî hamleleriyle bu yozlaşmış yer varoluştan silindi. Filo ağır kayıplar vererek sisteme sızdı, oradaki öteboyut yaratığını yok etti ve siklonik torpidolarla bütün dünyaları küle çevirdi. On yıl sonra gerçekuzaydaki öteboyut yırtığı kapandı.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda's crusade put an end to the existence of this corrupted place. With heavy losses, her fleet broke into the system, defeated the warp spawn there, and bombed every world to ash with cyclonic torpedoes. A decade later, the warp tear in realspace closed.

traits.locale_text: İncendia Chorda'nın askerî hamleleriyle bu yozlaşmış yer varoluştan silindi. Filo ağır kayıplar vererek sisteme sızdı, oradaki öteboyut yaratığını yok etti ve siklonik torpidolarla bütün dünyaları küle çevirdi. On yıl sonra gerçekuzaydaki öteboyut yırtığı kapandı.
